title: Bug 110566 - Wrong data set result returned when set an invalid filter expression row[0]
description: When setting a filter expression like "row[0] equals to 0", the data set returns the wrong result or just a null result set.
OB: The first result record is returned when previewing the data set after setting a filter with the expression "row[0] equals to".
EB: As the developer stated, the filter expression "row[0]" can only be generated after fetching all the data. It should not be used as a filter expression.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Set a filter in the data set with the expression "row[0] equals to".
2. Click on the Preview tab.

Expected result: A relevant error message should be displayed.
